info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 4:02PM PDT until July 31 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST/5 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE, SOUTHEASTERN INYO, SAN BERNARDINO AND SOUTHWESTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 402 PM MST /402 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Henderson, Bullhead City, Boulder City, Laughlin, Searchlight, Primm, Jean, Cima, Katherine Landing, Mitchell Caverns, Nipton Road Mile Marker 3, Nipton, Cal-Nev-Ari, Nipton And Ivanpah Roads, Cottonwood Cove Campground, Cottonwood Cove, Mid Hills Campground, Goodsprings, Black Canyon Equestrian Campground and Hole In The Wall Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
